thread.title: Manchester City 5-3 Monaco PLAYER RATINGS: | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Manchester City 5-3 Monaco PLAYER RATINGS: | Daily Mail Online

author: Jack Gaughan For The Daily Mail
title: Manchester City 5-3 Monaco PLAYER RATINGS: | Daily Mail Online
text: Manchester City 5-3 Monaco PLAYER RATINGS: Sergio Aguero shines but Nicolas Otamendi has a night to forget Raheem Sterling put Manchester City ahead after good work form Leroy Sane Radamel Falcao and Kylian Mbappe had Monaco ahead before the break Sergio Aguero was harshly denied a penalty, and instead booked for diving Radamel Falcao misses penalty before Aguero equalises thanks to keeping error Falcao scored brilliant chipped second, before Aguero levelled again John Stones and Leroy Sane secure crucial first-leg lead for Pep Guardiola's men
